titles.title: To prohibit the Secretary of Agriculture from closing Farm Service Agency offices in Appomattox, Virginia, and Lunenburg, Virginia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 3/22/2007--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from closing or relocating any Farm Service Agency office located in Appomattox, Virginia, or Lunenburg, Virginia.
